content.rendered:
Directed by Mitali Ghoshal.

Written by Nishant Shandilya.

Cast Barun Sobti(Ron Sen). Amartya Ray(Shome Ray). Rajit Kapoor(Dr. Zahid Khan (as Rajit Kapur)). Panchi Bora(Shonali). Rajesh Sharma(Ravi Khanna). Chaiti Ghosal(Trishna Ray). Geetika Tyagi(Rica Sahay). Mrinal Mukherjee(Raghuda). Kalyan Chatterjee(Kaka). Pallavi Chatterjee(Shruti Jiji). Vikram Kochhar(Anindo). Kartikey Tripathi(Boston). Navjot Singh(Pali). Subrata Guha Roy(Shonal’s Father). Surya Kar(Cyrus Shah). Partha Rudra(Senior Reporter). Subhomoy Das(Ajit). Moinak Sengupta(Shan). Sayantan Halder(Ronit). Debashish Dutta(National Selector). Soumendu Chatterjee(CEO Venky). Nishant Shandilya(Reporter). Hridoy Deka(Store Manager). Bubu Kundu(Ron’s Mother). Zeeshan Ahmed(Guests in the Party). Swapnajit Sengupta(Guests in the Party (as Swapnojit Sengupta)). Yalini Chaturvedi(Guests in the Party). Rahul Chaki(Guests in the Party). Ashiana Mukherjee(Guests in the Party). Amit Mazumdar(Guests in the Party). Prakash(Guests in the Party). Sayantani Mukherjee(Guests in the Party) . Spencer Jorgea(Aluna).Anurag Soni

Language Hindi.

Producers Soumendu Chatterjee. Mitali Ghoshal. Kirti Modi. Akshat Pandey. Surya Sinha.

Production MS Productions 74.
